directions: In a large skillet over low heat, stir together the butter and flour. Cook until flour is evenly coated.
Over medium heat, stir in approximately 1/2 cup of milk at a time until thick.
Add the peas and onions and cook until hot. Season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen peas and onions, thawed
title: Creamed Peas and Onions
